subject: Hardcode exact version in Source0 field
commitMessage:
Hardcode exact version in Source0 field

This commit partially reverts cb142d0b9 ("do not hardcode versio, use
%{version} with substitution instead") as substitution doesn't seem
to be applied while exporting package to OBS.

With previous patch applied ``icu4c-UNEXPANDEDSHELLSCRIPT-src.tgz''
is exported to OBS. RPM handles substitution macro correctly, which
results in build break:

[   33s] error: File /home/abuild/rpmbuild/SOURCES/icu4c-4_8_1_1-src.tgz: No such file or directory

Change-Id: I57ac9555cb61ee6130d0456601a220f63ac81efe

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 2.

Patch Set 2: Code-Review+2

Yes, this broke with the recent change to librpm-tizen, where shell scripts in %() are no longer executed and are instead replaced by the static string.

Patch Set 2: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

Verified.

Could maintainer merge this ASAP?
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 2: Code-Review-1

hmm, this is a bug in gbs, so please fix gbs instead of changing packages to work with a broken gbs

Patch Set 2:

As much as I agree with you I would like icu to build. Please accept the patch so we can build an image and let's fix gbs later.
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: fix stary configure call
commitMessage:
fix stary configure call

- also fix groups
- use correct name instead of macro lib%{name}
- do not hardcode versio, use %{version} with substitution instead

Change-Id: Ie2d9642cfd8742f8ee4b44da22032065bfa7a863
Signed-off-by: Anas Nashif <anas.nashif@intel.com>
